content:

Amanieu commented on issue #3582:

CI failure is unrelated to this PR, it's a new warning from the latest Rust stable release.

fitzgen commented on issue #3582:

Thanks for the PR!

I don't think I'm familiar enough with the C API or our implementation of it to give this a proper review, especially on a Friday. @alexcrichton can take a look in a week and a half, or maybe someone else on the team feels confident enough to review this before then.

peterhuene commented on issue #3582:

It looks like a fix for the build issues has been merged, so this should be good to rebase now.

peterhuene commented on issue #3582:

@Amanieu Thanks again for the fixes!
